text: Ben Stawski (born 5 June 1990) is a badminton player from England. He graduated from Loughborough College with a Foundation Degree in Sports Science in 2010. In 2009, he won bronze medals at the European Junior Badminton Championships in team and mixed doubles event. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Mixed doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
